scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.compile: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js
scripts.compilew: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --win
scripts.compilem: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --mac
scripts.publish: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js --publish always
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:main && npm run typecheck:preload && npm run typecheck:renderer
